4. Press through the heel of the bent leg to lift your hips toward the ceiling, forming a straight line from shoulders to extended foot. Keep the bent leg’s knee roughly at 90 degrees.
5. While holding the top position, bend the elbow of the working arm to lower the weight toward your forehead, then extend it back to the starting position. Slowly lower your hips and repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Lie on the floor with one heel on an elevated surface and the other leg extended. Hold a dumbbell in one hand with the palm facing inward, other hand on your hip or floor. Engage your core and glutes, lift your hips to form a straight line. While holding the top, bend the elbow to lower the weight toward your forehead, then extend back up. Lower hips and repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Deadlift
written_instructions:
1. Stand with feet hip-width apart, toes pointing forward or slightly outward. Place a barbell on the floor in front of your shins.
2. Hinge at the hips and bend your knees to grip the barbell with hands just outside your knees, using either a double overhand or mixed grip. Keep your back flat and chest up.
3. Engage your core, pull your shoulder blades back, and maintain a neutral spine.
4. Drive through your heels, extend your hips and knees simultaneously to lift the barbell along your legs until standing fully upright.
5. Lower the barbell under control by hinging at the hips and bending your knees, keeping the bar close to your body, then repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Stand with feet hip-width apart and barbell in front. Hinge at the hips and bend your knees to grip the bar, back flat and chest up. Engage your core, lift the bar by extending hips and knees, then lower it along your legs under control. Repeat for reps.

name: Hip hinge
written_instructions:
1. Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding a PVC pipe along your spine so it touches your head, upper back, and tailbone.
2. Engage your core and keep your back neutral.
3. Hinge at the hips by pushing your hips backward, allowing your torso to lean forward while keeping the PVC pipe in contact with your head, upper back, and tailbone. Slightly bend your knees as needed for comfort.
4. Pause at the end of the hinge when you feel a stretch in your hamstrings.
5. Return to the starting position by driving your hips forward and standing upright. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding a PVC pipe along your spine. Engage your core, hinge at the hips by pushing them back, keeping the pipe touching your head, upper back, and tailbone. Pause, then drive your hips forward to return to standing. Repeat for reps.

name: Sumo deadlift
written_instructions:
1. Stand with feet wider than shoulder-width apart, toes slightly pointed outward. Position a barbell on the floor over your mid-foot.
2. Hinge at the hips and bend your knees to grip the bar with hands inside your legs, using an overhand grip. Keep your chest up and back flat.
3. Engage your core, pull your shoulder blades back, and maintain a neutral spine.
4. Drive through your heels, extend your hips and knees simultaneously to lift the barbell until standing fully upright.
5. Lower the barbell under control by hinging at the hips and bending your knees, keeping the bar close to your body, then repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Stand with feet wider than shoulder-width, toes slightly out, barbell over mid-foot. Grip the bar with hands inside your legs, back flat and chest up. Engage your core, lift the bar by extending hips and knees, then lower under control. Repeat for reps.

name: Hex trap bar deadlift
written_instructions:
1. Stand inside a hex/trap bar with feet hip-width apart, toes pointing forward. Grip the handles with palms facing your body. 
2. Engage your core and maintain a neutral spine.
3. Hinge at your hips and bend your knees slightly to prepare for the lift, keeping your chest up.
4. Drive through your heels, extend your hips and knees simultaneously to lift the bar until standing fully upright.
5. Lower the bar under control by hinging at the hips and bending your knees, then repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Stand inside a hex/trap bar with feet hip-width apart and grip the handles, bar on the floor. Engage your core, hinge at the hips, and bend your knees. Drive through your heels to lift the bar by extending hips and knees, then lower under control. Repeat for reps.

name: Dumbbell romanian deadlift (RDL)
written_instructions:
1. Hold a dumbbell in each hand in front of your thighs, palms facing your legs. Stand upright with feet hip-width apart.
2. Engage your core and maintain a neutral spine.
3. Slightly bend your knees and hinge at the hips to lower the dumbbells along the front of your legs. Keep your chest up and back flat.
4. Lower until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, usually just below the knees.
5. Drive your hips forward to return to standing, squeezing your glutes at the top, then repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Hold a dumbbell in each hand in front of your thighs, palms facing your legs. Stand with feet hip-width apart, core engaged, back neutral. Slightly bend your knees and hinge at the hips to lower the dumbbells along your legs until you feel a hamstring stretch. Drive your hips forward to stand and squeeze your glutes. Repeat for reps.

name: Barbell romanian deadlift (RDL)
written_instructions:
1. Hold a barbell in front of your thighs with a pronated grip (palms facing your legs). Stand upright with feet hip-width apart.
2. Engage your core and maintain a neutral spine.
3. Slightly bend your knees and hinge at the hips to lower the barbell along the front of your legs. Keep your chest up and back flat.
4. Lower until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, usually just below the knees.
5. Drive your hips forward to return to standing, squeezing your glutes at the top, then repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Hold a barbell in front of your thighs, palms facing your legs. Stand with feet hip-width apart, core engaged, back neutral. Slightly bend your knees and hinge at the hips to lower the bar along your legs until you feel a hamstring stretch. Drive your hips forward to stand and squeeze your glutes. Repeat for reps.

name: Bodyweight single leg romanian deadlift (RDL)
written_instructions:
1. Stand upright on one leg with the other leg slightly bent behind you. Keep your standing foot hip-width apart for balance.
2. Engage your core and maintain a neutral spine.
3. Hinge at the hips, lowering your torso forward while extending the non-standing leg straight behind you. Keep your back flat and arms extended toward the floor or in front of you for balance.
4. Lower until you feel a stretch in the hamstring of the standing leg.
5. Drive your hips forward to return to standing, squeezing your glutes at the top, then repeat for the desired number of reps before switching legs.
audio_script: Stand on one leg with the other leg extended behind you. Engage your core, hinge at the hips to lower your torso while keeping the back flat and arms extended forward. Feel the stretch in the standing leg’s hamstring, then return to standing and squeeze your glutes. Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Dumbbell single leg romanian deadlift (RDL)
written_instructions:
1. Hold a dumbbell in each hand in front of your thighs, palms facing your legs. Stand on one leg with the other leg slightly bent behind you.
2. Engage your core and maintain a neutral spine.
3. Hinge at the hips, lowering the dumbbells along the front of your standing leg while extending the non-standing leg straight behind you. Keep your back flat.
4. Lower until you feel a stretch in the hamstring of the standing leg.
5. Drive your hips forward to return to standing, squeezing your glutes at the top, then repeat for the desired number of reps before switching legs.
audio_script: Hold a dumbbell in each hand in front of your thighs, palms facing your legs. Stand on one leg with the other extended behind you. Engage your core, hinge at the hips, and lower the dumbbells along the front of the standing leg. Feel the hamstring stretch, then return to standing and squeeze your glutes. Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Good morning smith machine
written_instructions:
1. Position yourself under a Smith machine bar, resting it across your upper back (trapezius). Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
2. Engage your core and maintain a neutral spine.
3. With a slight bend in your knees, hinge at the hips to lean your torso forward while keeping your back flat.
4. Lower until your torso is roughly parallel to the floor or you feel a stretch in your hamstrings.
5. Drive your hips forward to return to standing, keeping your chest up, then repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Position yourself under a Smith machine bar on your upper back, feet shoulder-width apart. Engage your core, hinge at the hips with a slight knee bend, and lean forward keeping your back flat. Lower until your torso is roughly parallel to the floor, then drive your hips forward to stand. Repeat for reps.

name: Barbell good morning
written_instructions:
1. Position a barbell across your upper back (trapezius), standing with feet shoulder-width apart.
2. Engage your core and maintain a neutral spine.
3. With a slight bend in your knees, hinge at the hips to lean your torso forward while keeping your back flat.
4. Lower until your torso is roughly parallel to the floor or you feel a stretch in your hamstrings.
5. Drive your hips forward to return to standing, keeping your chest up, then repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Place a barbell across your upper back, feet shoulder-width apart. Engage your core, hinge at the hips with a slight knee bend, and lean forward keeping your back flat. Lower until your torso is roughly parallel to the floor, then drive your hips forward to stand. Repeat for reps.

name: Step ups
written_instructions:
1. Stand upright facing a sturdy platform or bench, feet hip-width apart.
2. Engage your core and keep your chest up.
3. Step onto the platform with one foot, pressing through the heel to lift your body up until your standing leg is fully extended.
4. Slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps on the working leg before switching sides.
audio_script: Stand facing a sturdy platform, feet hip-width apart. Step onto the platform with one foot, pressing through the heel to lift your body. Slowly lower back down. Repeat for reps on that side, then switch legs.

name: Step ups with glute kickback
written_instructions:
1. Stand upright facing a sturdy platform or bench, feet hip-width apart.
2. Engage your core and keep your chest up.
3. Step onto the platform with one foot, pressing through the heel to lift your body up until your standing leg is fully extended.
4. At the top, extend the non-working leg straight back and upward, performing a glute kickback.
5. Lower the non-working leg and your body back to the starting position. Repeat for the desired number of reps on the working leg before switching sides.
audio_script: Stand facing a sturdy platform. Step up with one foot, pressing through the heel to lift your body. At the top, extend the other leg back and up for a glute kickback, then lower back down. Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Step ups with dumbells
written_instructions:
1. Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides, palms facing your body.
2. Stand upright facing a sturdy platform or bench, feet hip-width apart.
3. Step onto the platform with one foot, pressing through the heel to lift your body until your standing leg is fully extended.
4. Slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps on the working leg before switching sides.
audio_script: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides. Step onto a platform, pressing through the heel to lift your body. Lower back down and repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Step ups with bicep curls
written_instructions:
1. Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides, palms facing your body.
2. Stand upright facing a sturdy platform or bench, feet hip-width apart.
3. Step onto the platform with one foot, pressing through the heel to lift your body while simultaneously curling the dumbbells toward your shoulders.
4. Lower the dumbbells as you step back down to the starting position.
5. Step up with the other leg and repeat, continuing to alternate legs for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides. Step onto a platform, curling the dumbbells toward your shoulders as you lift. Lower back down and repeat, alternating legs for reps.

name: Horizontal leg press machine
written_instructions:
1. Sit on the horizontal leg press machine with your back and head against the pad, feet flat on the platform hip-width apart.
2. Place your hands on the handles for support.
3. Engage your core and press through your heels to extend your legs, fully straightening your knees without locking them.
4. Slowly bend your knees to lower the platform toward your body under control.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Sit on the machine with back against the pad, feet flat on the platform. Press through your heels to extend your legs, then slowly bend your knees to lower the platform. Repeat for reps.

name: 45-degree leg press machine
written_instructions:
1. Sit on the 45-degree leg press machine with your back and head against the pad, feet flat on the platform hip-width apart.
2. Place your hands on the handles for support.
3. Engage your core and press through your heels to extend your legs, fully straightening your knees without locking them.
4. Slowly bend your knees to lower the platform toward your body under control.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Sit on the machine with back against the pad, feet flat on the platform. Press through your heels to extend your legs, then slowly bend your knees to lower the platform. Repeat for reps.

name: Hack squat
written_instructions:
1. Stand on the hack squat machine with your back against the pad, feet hip-width apart on the platform.
2. Place your shoulders under the shoulder pads and engage your core.
3. Bend your knees and hips to lower your body until your thighs are roughly parallel to the platform.
4. Press through your heels to extend your knees and hips, returning to the starting position.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Stand on the machine with back against the pad, shoulders under pads. Bend knees and hips to lower until thighs are roughly parallel, then press through your heels to return to start. Repeat for reps.

name: Side-lying hip abduction
written_instructions:
1. Lie on your side with your legs extended straight and stacked on top of each other. Rest your head on your bottom arm, and place your top hand on your hip for support.
2. Engage your core and keep your hips stacked.
3. Lift the top leg upward as high as comfortably possible, keeping it straight.
4. Pause at the top and squeeze your glutes.
5. Slowly lower the leg back down and repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Lie on your side with legs stacked. Lift the top leg upward, squeeze glutes at the top, then lower. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Side-lying banded hip abduction
written_instructions:
1. Place a mini loop band just above your knees. Lie on your side with legs stacked, resting your head on your bottom arm and top hand on your hip.
2. Engage your core and keep your hips stacked.
3. Push your top leg outward against the resistance of the band, lifting as high as comfortably possible.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your glutes.
5. Slowly return the leg to starting position and repeat for reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Lie on your side with a mini loop band above your knees. Lift the top leg outward against the band, squeeze glutes, then lower. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Side plank hip abduction
written_instructions:
1. Start in a side plank position on your elbow, bottom knee bent for support, and top leg extended straight. Stack your hips.
2. Engage your core and glutes.
3. Lift the top leg upward as high as comfortably possible, keeping it straight.
4. Pause at the top, then slowly lower the leg under control.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Hold a side plank on your elbow with bottom knee bent. Lift the top leg straight up, squeeze glutes, then lower. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Side plank banded hip abduction
written_instructions:
1. Place a mini loop band just above your knees. Get into a side plank position on your elbow, bottom knee bent, top leg extended.
2. Engage your core and keep hips stacked.
3. Push your top leg outward against the band, lifting it as high as comfortably possible.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your glutes.
5. Slowly lower the leg and repeat for reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Hold a side plank with a mini loop band above your knees. Lift the top leg against the band, squeeze glutes, then lower. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Clamshells
written_instructions:
1. Lie on your side with knees bent at roughly 90 degrees and legs stacked. Rest your head on your bottom arm and place your top hand on your hip.
2. Engage your core and keep your hips stacked.
3. Lift your top knee as high as comfortably possible while keeping your feet together.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your glutes.
5. Slowly lower your knee back down and repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Lie on your side with knees bent, feet together. Lift the top knee while keeping feet together, squeeze glutes, then lower. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Banded clamshells
written_instructions:
1. Place a mini loop band just above your knees. Lie on your side with knees bent at roughly 90 degrees and legs stacked. Rest your head on your bottom arm and place your top hand on your hip.
2. Engage your core and keep your hips stacked.
3. Push your top knee outward against the resistance of the band while keeping your feet together.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your glutes.
5. Slowly return your knee to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Lie on your side with knees bent and a mini loop band above your knees. Push your top knee outward against the band, squeeze glutes, then return. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Standing hip abduction
written_instructions:
1. Stand upright next to a wall or support for balance, feet hip-width apart.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Lift one leg out to the side as high as comfortably possible, keeping it straight.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your glutes.
5. Slowly lower the leg and repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Stand upright, holding a support if needed. Lift one leg out to the side, squeeze glutes, then lower. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Standing banded hip abduction
written_instructions:
1. Place a mini loop band just above your knees. Stand upright next to a wall or support, feet hip-width apart.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Push one leg outward against the resistance of the band, lifting it as high as comfortably possible.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your glutes.
5. Slowly return the leg to the starting position and repeat for reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Stand with a mini loop band above your knees. Push one leg outward against the band, squeeze glutes, then return. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Lateral band walk
written_instructions:
1. Place a mini loop band just above your knees (or around ankles for more resistance). Stand with feet hip-width apart and knees slightly bent.
2. Engage your core and keep your chest up.
3. Take small steps to the side, maintaining tension on the band throughout the movement.
4. Continue stepping laterally for the desired number of steps.
5. Repeat in the opposite direction.
audio_script: Place a mini loop band above your knees or ankles, knees slightly bent. Step sideways with small controlled steps, keeping tension on the band. Repeat for reps, then reverse direction.

name: Standing cable hip abduction
written_instructions:
1. Attach an ankle strap to a low cable pulley and secure it around one ankle. Stand upright next to the cable machine for support, feet hip-width apart.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Lift the strapped leg out to the side against the cable’s resistance as high as comfortably possible.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your glutes.
5. Slowly return the leg to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Attach an ankle strap to a low cable pulley. Stand upright holding support. Lift the strapped leg out to the side against resistance, squeeze glutes, then return. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Seated abduction machine
written_instructions:
1. Sit on the abduction machine with your back against the pad and feet on the platform. Adjust the pads to rest against the outside of your knees or thighs.
2. Engage your core and keep your chest upright.
3. Push outward against the pads to spread your legs apart.
4. Pause at the end of the movement, squeezing your glutes.
5. Slowly return your legs to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Sit on the machine with back against the pad, feet on the platform. Push outward against the pads, squeeze glutes, then return. Repeat for reps.

name: Bodyweight glute kickback
written_instructions:
1. Start on all fours with hands under shoulders and knees under hips.
2. Engage your core.
3. Extend one leg straight back and upward, keeping the knee slightly bent or straight.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your glutes.
5. Lower the leg under control and repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Start on all fours. Extend one leg straight back and up, squeeze glutes at the top, then lower. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Banded glute kickback
written_instructions:
1. Place a mini loop band around your thighs just above your knees. Start on all fours, hands under shoulders and knees under hips.
2. Engage your core.
3. Extend one leg back and upward against the resistance of the band, keeping the knee slightly bent or straight.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your glutes.
5. Slowly return the leg to the starting position and repeat for reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Start on all fours with a mini loop band above your knees. Extend one leg back against the band, squeeze glutes, then return. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Standing banded glute kickback
written_instructions:
1. Place a mini loop band around your thighs just above your knees. Stand upright holding onto a support for balance, feet hip-width apart.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Extend one leg backward against the resistance of the band while keeping your knee slightly bent.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your glutes.
5. Slowly return the leg to the starting position and repeat for reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Stand with a mini loop band above your knees, holding support. Extend one leg back against the band, squeeze glutes, then return. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Standing cable glute kickback
written_instructions:
1. Attach an ankle strap to a low cable pulley and secure it around one ankle. Stand upright next to the cable machine for support, feet hip-width apart.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Extend the strapped leg backward against the cable’s resistance, keeping the knee slightly bent.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your glutes.
5. Slowly return the leg to the starting position and repeat for reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Attach an ankle strap to a low cable pulley. Extend the strapped leg backward against resistance, squeeze glutes, then return. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Lying down banded hamstring curl
variations: Single leg lying down banded hamstring curl
Single leg lying down cable hamstring curl
Lying down plated hamstring curl machine
written_instructions:
1. Lie face down on the floor with ankle straps on both ankles connected to a single loop band.
2. Engage your core and keep your hips pressed against the floor.
3. Bend both knees simultaneously to pull your heels toward your glutes, working against the resistance of the band.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your hamstrings.
5. Slowly extend your legs back to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie face down with ankle straps on both ankles connected to a loop band. Bend both knees to pull your heels toward your glutes, squeeze at the top, then slowly return. Repeat for reps.

name: Lying down cable hamstring curl
variations: Single leg lying down banded hamstring curl
Single leg lying down cable hamstring curl
Lying down plated hamstring curl machine
written_instructions:
1. Attach an ankle strap to each ankle and connect both to the same low cable pulley. Lie face down on the floor or a bench.
2. Engage your core and keep your hips pressed against the floor or bench.
3. Bend both knees simultaneously to pull your heels toward your glutes against the cable resistance.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your hamstrings.
5. Slowly extend your legs back to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Attach an ankle strap to each ankle and connect to the same low cable pulley. Lie face down on the floor or a bench. Bend both knees to pull your heels toward your glutes against the cable, squeeze at the top, then slowly return. Repeat for reps.

name: Single leg lying down banded hamstring curl
variations: Single leg lying down cable hamstring curl
Lying down plated hamstring curl machine
written_instructions:
1. Lie face down on the floor or bench with an ankle strap on one ankle connected to a single loop band.
2. Engage your core and keep your hips pressed against the floor.
3. Bend the strapped knee to pull your heel toward your glutes against the band resistance.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your hamstrings.
5. Slowly extend the leg back and repeat for reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Lie face down with an ankle strap on one ankle connected to a loop band. Bend that knee to pull the heel toward your glutes, squeeze, then lower. Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Single leg lying down cable hamstring curl
variations: Single leg lying down banded hamstring curl
Lying down plated hamstring curl machine
written_instructions:
1. Attach an ankle strap to a low cable pulley and secure it around one ankle. Lie face down on the floor or a bench.
2. Engage your core.
3. Bend the strapped leg to pull your heel toward your glutes against the cable resistance.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your hamstrings.
5. Slowly extend the leg back and repeat for reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Attach an ankle strap to a low cable pulley. Lie face down on the floor or a bench. Bend the strapped leg to pull the heel toward your glutes, squeeze, then lower. Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Lying down plated hamstring curl machine
variations: Single leg lying down banded hamstring curl
Single leg lying down cable hamstring curl
written_instructions:
1. Lie face down on the hamstring curl machine and place your ankles under the padded lever.
2. Engage your core and keep your hips pressed against the bench.
3. Bend your knees to curl the lever toward your glutes.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your hamstrings.
5. Slowly lower the lever back to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie face down on the machine with ankles under the pad. Bend your knees to curl the lever toward your glutes, squeeze, then lower. Repeat for reps.

name: Seated plated hamstring curl machine
variations: Single leg lying down banded hamstring curl
Single leg lying down cable hamstring curl
Lying down plated hamstring curl machine
written_instructions:
1. Sit on the hamstring curl machine with your lower legs over the padded lever, back against the pad.
2. Engage your core and keep your back pressed against the pad.
3. Bend your knees to curl the lever toward your glutes.
4. Slowly extend your legs back to the starting position under control.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Sit on the machine with your lower legs over the padded lever. Bend your knees to curl the lever toward your glutes, then slowly extend back down. Repeat for reps.

name: Quad extension machine
written_instructions:
1. Sit on the leg extension machine with your back against the pad and feet under the padded lever, knee joint aligned with the machine pivot.
2. Engage your core and hold the handles for support.
3. Extend your knees to lift the lever until your legs are straight.
4. Slowly lower the lever back to the starting position under control.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Sit with knees aligned to the machine pivot, feet under the pad. Extend your knees to lift the lever, then lower slowly under control. Repeat for reps.

name: Single leg quad extension machine
written_instructions:
1. Sit on the leg extension machine with your back against the pad and one foot under the padded lever, knee joint aligned with the machine pivot.
2. Engage your core and hold the handles for support.
3. Extend the knee of the working leg to lift the lever until your leg is straight.
4. Slowly lower the lever back to the starting position under control.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps before switching legs.
audio_script: Sit with one foot under the pad, knee aligned with the machine pivot. Extend the working knee to lift the lever, then lower slowly under control. Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Seated banded adduction
written_instructions:
1. Sit upright on a bench or chair with an ankle strap on the working leg, connected to a loop band anchored to a stable point. Extend the working leg straight in front of you.
2. Engage your core and keep your back straight.
3. Move the working leg inward toward the midline of your body against the resistance of the band.
4. Squeeze your inner thigh at the end of the movement.
5. Slowly return the leg to the starting position and repeat for reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Sit upright with an ankle strap on the working leg, connected to a mini loop band. Extend the leg straight in front of you, move it inward against the band, squeeze the inner thigh, then return. Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Seated adduction machine
written_instructions:
1. Sit on the adduction machine with your legs placed against the pads. Adjust the seat and pads so your knees are slightly bent.
2. Engage your core and keep your back against the pad.
3. Bring your legs together against the resistance of the machine.
4. Pause at the end, squeezing your inner thighs.
5. Slowly return your legs to the starting position and repeat for reps.
audio_script: Sit with legs against the pads. Bring your legs together against the resistance, squeeze inner thighs, then slowly return. Repeat for reps.

name: Standing cable adduction
written_instructions:
1. Attach an ankle strap to a low cable pulley and secure it around one ankle. Stand upright next to the cable machine for support, feet hip-width apart.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Move the strapped leg inward toward the midline of your body against the cable’s resistance.
4. Squeeze your inner thigh at the end of the movement.
5. Slowly return the leg to the starting position and repeat for reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Attach an ankle strap to a low cable pulley. Stand upright, move the strapped leg inward against the cable, squeeze the inner thigh, then return. Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Seated cable adduction
written_instructions:
1. Sit upright on a bench or chair with an ankle strap on the working leg, connected to a low cable pulley. Extend the working leg straight in front of you.
2. Engage your core and keep your back straight.
3. Move the working leg inward toward the midline of your body against the cable’s resistance.
4. Squeeze your inner thigh at the end of the movement.
5. Slowly return the leg to the starting position and repeat for reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Sit upright with an ankle strap on the working leg, connected to a low cable pulley. Extend the leg straight in front of you, move it inward against the cable, squeeze the inner thigh, then return. Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Standing bodyweight calf extensions
variations: Standing single leg calf extensions with 2 Dumbbell
Single leg seated dumbbell calf extensions
written_instructions:
1. Stand upright on the edge of an elevated surface (e.g., step or block) with the balls of your feet on the edge, heels hanging off. Optionally hold a wall or support for balance.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Raise your heels as high as comfortably possible.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your calves.
5. Slowly lower your heels below the level of the platform to feel a stretch, then repeat for reps.
audio_script: Stand on the edge of a step with heels hanging off. Raise your heels as high as possible, squeeze calves, then lower below the step for a stretch. Repeat for reps.

name: Standing single leg calf extensions
variations: Standing single leg calf extensions with 2 Dumbbell
Single leg seated dumbbell calf extensions
progression: Standing single leg calf extensions with 2 Dumbbell
written_instructions:
1. Stand on one foot on the edge of an elevated surface, balls of the foot on the edge, heel hanging off. Use a wall or support for balance.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Raise your heel as high as comfortably possible.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing the calf.
5. Slowly lower the heel below the platform level for a stretch, then repeat for reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Stand on one foot on a step, heel hanging off. Raise the heel, squeeze calf, then lower below step for a stretch. Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Standing single leg calf extensions with 2 Dumbbell
variations: Single leg seated dumbbell calf extensions
written_instructions:
1. Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides. 
2. Stand on one foot, engage your core, and keep your torso upright.
3. Raise your heel off the ground, pushing through the ball of the foot to lift as high as comfortably possible.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing the calf.
5. Slowly lower the heel and repeat for reps before switching sides.
audio_script: Hold a dumbbell in each hand. Stand on one foot, raise your heel, squeeze the calf, then lower. Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Standing plated calf machine
variations: Standing single leg calf extensions with 2 Dumbbell
Single leg seated dumbbell calf extensions
written_instructions:
1. Position yourself on the standing calf raise machine with the balls of your feet on the platform and heels hanging off.
2. Rest your shoulders under the pads and engage your core.
3. Press through the balls of your feet to raise your heels as high as possible.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your calves.
5. Slowly lower your heels below platform level to stretch the calves, then repeat for reps.
audio_script: Stand on the machine with balls of your feet on the platform, heels hanging off. Raise heels as high as possible, squeeze calves, then lower below platform for a stretch. Repeat for reps.

name: Seated plated calf machine
variations: Standing single leg calf extensions with 2 Dumbbell
Single leg seated dumbbell calf extensions
written_instructions:
1. Sit on the seated calf raise machine with the balls of your feet on the platform and heels hanging off, and pads resting on your thighs.
2. Engage your core and keep your back straight.
3. Press through the balls of your feet to lift your heels as high as possible.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your calves.
5. Slowly lower your heels below platform level for a stretch, then repeat for reps.
audio_script: Sit on the machine with balls of your feet on the platform, heels hanging off. Press up through the balls of your feet, squeeze calves, then lower below platform for a stretch. Repeat for reps.

name: Seated dumbbell calf extensions
variations: Standing single leg calf extensions with 2 Dumbbell
Single leg seated dumbbell calf extensions
written_instructions:
1. Sit on a bench with dumbbells placed on thighs, balls of the feet on an elevated surface and heels hanging off.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Press through the balls of your feet to raise your heels as high as possible.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing your calves.
5. Slowly lower your heels below the surface for a stretch, then repeat for reps.
audio_script: Sit on a bench with dumbbells on your thighs, balls of your feet on a step. Raise your heels as high as possible, squeeze calves, then lower below step. Repeat for reps.

name: Single leg seated dumbbell calf extensions
variations: Standing single leg calf extensions with 2 Dumbbell
written_instructions:
1. Sit on a bench with a dumbbell on the working thigh, balls of one foot on an elevated surface and heel hanging off.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Press through the ball of the foot to raise your heel as high as possible.
4. Pause at the top, squeezing the calf.
5. Slowly lower the heel below the surface for a stretch, then repeat for reps before switching legs.
audio_script: Sit on a bench with a dumbbell on one thigh, ball of the foot on a step. Raise the heel, squeeze calf, then lower below step. Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Static lower back extension
written_instructions:
1. Lie face down on a back extension bench with hips at the pad’s edge and feet secured.
2. Engage your core and glutes.
3. Maintain a neutral spine and lift your torso slightly upward, just enough to engage the lower back muscles.
4. Hold this position for the desired duration, keeping the spine neutral.
5. Slowly lower your torso back to the starting position and repeat if performing multiple sets or holds.
audio_script: Lie face down on a back extension bench. Lift your torso slightly, keeping your spine neutral, hold for the desired duration, then lower back down. Repeat if doing multiple holds.

name: Weighted static lower back extension
written_instructions:
1. Lie face down on a back extension bench with hips at the pad’s edge and feet secured. Hold a weight plate or dumbbell against your chest.
2. Engage your core and glutes.
3. Maintain a neutral spine and lift your torso slightly upward, enough to engage the lower back muscles.
4. Hold this position for the desired duration, keeping the spine neutral.
5. Slowly lower your torso back to the starting position and repeat if performing multiple sets or holds.
audio_script: Lie face down on a back extension bench with a weight on your chest. Lift your torso slightly, keeping your spine neutral, hold, then lower back down. Repeat for reps or holds.

name: Dynamic lower back extension
written_instructions:
1. Lie face down on a back extension bench with hips at the pad’s edge and feet secured.
2. Engage your core and glutes.
3. Lift your torso upward while keeping a neutral spine.
4. Slowly lower your torso back down under control.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie face down on a back extension bench. Lift your torso, keeping a neutral spine, then lower under control. Repeat for reps.

name: Weighted dynamic lower back extension
written_instructions:
1. Lie face down on a back extension bench with hips at the pad’s edge and feet secured. Hold a weight plate or dumbbell against your chest.
2. Engage your core and glutes.
3. Lift your torso upward while keeping a neutral spine.
4. Slowly lower the torso back down under control.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie face down on a back extension bench with a weight on your chest. Lift your torso, keeping spine neutral, then lower under control. Repeat for reps.

name: Stability ball deadbug
written_instructions:
1. Lie on your back on the floor, holding a stability ball between your hands and knees, elbows slightly bent.
2. Engage your core and press your lower back into the floor.
3. Slowly extend one arm and the opposite leg outward while maintaining the squeeze on the ball and keeping your lower back pressed into the floor.
4. Return the arm and leg to the starting position.
5. Repeat on the other side and continue alternating for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie on your back holding a stability ball between your hands and knees. Engage your core, extend one arm and the opposite leg outward while keeping the ball squeezed and your lower back pressed into the floor, then return. Alternate sides for reps.

name: Deadbug
written_instructions:
1. Lie on your back on the floor with arms extended toward the ceiling and knees bent at 90 degrees.
2. Engage your core and press your lower back into the floor.
3. Slowly lower one arm and the opposite leg toward the floor without letting your lower back arch.
4. Return the arm and leg to the starting position.
5. Repeat on the other side and continue alternating for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie on the floor with arms up, knees at 90 degrees. Lower one arm and opposite leg without arching the back, return, and alternate for reps.

name: Deadbug with dumbbell
written_instructions:
1. Lie on your back on the floor with knees bent at 90 degrees and hold a dumbbell in both hands over your chest, arms extended.
2. Engage your core and press your lower back into the floor.
3. Slowly extend both arms backward and one leg downward, keeping the opposite leg bent and spine neutral.
4. Return the arms and leg to the starting position.
5. Alternate sides and repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie on your back holding a dumbbell with both hands over your chest. Extend both arms backward and one leg down, keep your lower back pressed, then return. Alternate sides for reps.

name: Deadbug with 2 Dumbbell
written_instructions:
1. Lie on your back on the floor with knees bent at 90 degrees and hold a dumbbell in each hand above your chest.
2. Engage your core and press your lower back into the floor.
3. Slowly extend one arm and the opposite leg outward while keeping the other arm and leg in place, maintaining a neutral spine.
4. Return the arm and leg to the starting position.
5. Alternate sides and continue for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie on your back holding a dumbbell in each hand above your chest. Extend one arm and opposite leg outward while keeping the other arm and leg in place, then return. Alternate sides for reps.

name: Deadbug with kettlebell
written_instructions:
1. Lie on your back on the floor with knees bent at 90 degrees and hold a kettlebell in both hands over your chest, arms extended.
2. Engage your core and press your lower back into the floor.
3. Slowly extend both arms backward and one leg downward while keeping the opposite leg bent and spine neutral.
4. Return the arms and leg to the starting position.
5. Alternate sides and repeat for reps.
audio_script: Lie on your back holding a kettlebell over your chest with both hands. Extend both arms backward and one leg down, keeping spine neutral, then return. Alternate sides for reps.

name: Alternating toe reach
written_instructions:
1. Lie flat on your back on the floor with arms at your sides and legs extended.
2. Engage your core and press your lower back into the floor.
3. Lift one leg up toward the ceiling while simultaneously reaching your opposite arm toward that foot.
4. Lower both the leg and arm back to the ground under control.
5. Alternate sides for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie flat on your back with arms at your sides. Lift one leg up and reach the opposite arm toward that foot, then return. Alternate sides for reps.

name: Single straight leg raise
written_instructions:
1. Lie on your back on the floor with one leg extended on the ground and the other leg straight up toward the ceiling.
2. Engage your core and press your lower back into the floor.
3. Slowly lower the raised leg toward the floor without letting your lower back arch.
4. Pause briefly just above the floor.
5. Raise the leg back to the starting position and repeat for reps before switching legs.
audio_script: Lie on your back with one leg on the floor and the other straight up. Lower the raised leg slowly without arching your back, then lift back up. Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

name: Kneeling plank
written_instructions:
1. Start on all fours with elbows under shoulders and knees on the ground.
2. Engage your core and glutes, keeping your back flat.
3. Move your knees backward away from your shoulders to extend your torso, forming a longer plank position while keeping your knees on the ground.
4. Maintain this position for the desired duration, drawing your navel toward your spine.
5. Slowly return to the starting position and rest before repeating if performing multiple holds.
audio_script: Start on all fours with elbows under shoulders and knees on the ground. Engage your core and glutes, slide your knees back to extend your torso into a longer plank, hold, then return.

name: Plank
written_instructions:
1. Start on the floor in a forearm plank position with elbows under shoulders and feet hip-width apart.
2. Engage your core and glutes, keeping your spine neutral.
3. Maintain a straight line from head to heels.
4. Hold this position for the desired duration.
5. Slowly release and rest before repeating if performing multiple holds.
audio_script: Hold a forearm plank with elbows under shoulders and feet hip-width apart. Engage core and glutes, keep a straight line from head to heels.

name: Straight arm plank
written_instructions:
1. Start in a push-up position with hands under shoulders and feet hip-width apart.
2. Engage your core and glutes, keeping your spine neutral.
3. Maintain a straight line from head to heels.
4. Hold this position for the desired duration.
5. Slowly release and rest before repeating if performing multiple holds.
audio_script: Hold a push-up position with hands under shoulders and feet hip-width apart. Engage core and glutes, keep a straight line from head to heels.

name: Kneeling side plank
written_instructions:
1. Start on your side with your forearm on the ground under your shoulder and knees bent, stacked on top of each other.
2. Engage your core and glutes, keeping your torso straight.
3. Lift your hips off the ground to form a straight line from your knees to shoulders.
4. Hold this position for the desired duration.
5. Slowly lower your hips back to the ground and repeat for the other side.
audio_script: Lie on your side with forearm on the ground and knees bent. Lift your hips to form a straight line from knees to shoulders, engage core and glutes, hold, then switch sides.

name: Side plank
written_instructions:
1. Start on your side with your forearm on the ground under your shoulder and legs extended straight, stacked on top of each other.
2. Engage your core and glutes.
3. Lift your hips off the ground to form a straight line from head to feet.
4. Hold this position for the desired duration.
5. Slowly lower your hips and repeat for the other side.
audio_script: Lie on your side with forearm on the ground and legs straight. Lift your hips to form a straight line from head to feet, engage core and glutes, hold, then switch sides.

name: Weighted side plank
written_instructions:
1. Start in a side plank position on your forearm, legs extended and stacked, with your top hand holding a dumbbell on your hip.
2. Engage your core and glutes, keeping your spine neutral.
3. Lift your hips off the ground to form a straight line from head to feet.
4. Hold this position for the desired duration.
5. Slowly lower your hips and repeat for the other side.
audio_script: Hold a side plank on your forearm with legs stacked, top hand holding a dumbbell on your hip. Lift hips to form a straight line, hold, then lower. Repeat on the other side.

name: Static bird dog
written_instructions:
1. Start on all fours with hands under shoulders and knees under hips.
2. Engage your core and keep your back flat.
3. Extend one arm forward and the opposite leg backward, keeping both straight.
4. Hold this position for the desired duration while maintaining a neutral spine.
5. Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.
audio_script: Start on all fours. Extend one arm forward and the opposite leg back, hold while keeping spine neutral, then return. Repeat on the other side.

name: Dynamic bird dog
written_instructions:
1. Start on all fours with hands under shoulders and knees under hips.
2. Engage your core and keep your back flat.
3. Extend one arm forward and the opposite leg backward.
4. Return the arm and leg to the starting position under control.
5. Alternate sides and continue for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Start on all fours. Extend one arm forward and opposite leg back, then return. Alternate sides for reps.

name: Lying leg raises
variations: Lying leg raises with band abduction
Lying leg raises with stability ball
Lying leg raises with kettlebell pullover
progression: Lying leg raises with stability ball
written_instructions:
1. Lie flat on your back with legs extended and arms at your sides.
2. Engage your core and press your lower back into the floor.
3. Lift both legs toward the ceiling while keeping them straight.
4. Lower your legs back down under control without letting your lower back arch.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie on your back with legs extended. Lift both legs up toward the ceiling, lower slowly without arching your back, and repeat for reps.

name: Lying leg raises with band abduction
variations: Lying leg raises with stability ball
Lying leg raises with kettlebell pullover
written_instructions:
1. Lie flat on your back with a mini loop band around your thighs just above the knees, legs extended and arms at your sides.
2. Engage your core and press your lower back into the floor.
3. Lift your legs toward the ceiling while pushing your knees outward against the band.
4. Lower your legs under control without letting your lower back arch.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie on your back with a mini loop band above your knees. Lift your legs up while pushing knees outward against the band, lower slowly, and repeat for reps.

name: Lying leg raises with stability ball
variations: Lying leg raises with band abduction
Lying leg raises with kettlebell pullover
written_instructions:
1. Lie on your back with a stability ball held between your feet, arms at your sides for support.
2. Engage your core and press your lower back into the floor.
3. Lift your legs and the ball toward the ceiling while keeping your legs straight.
4. Slowly lower your legs and the ball under control without letting your lower back arch.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie on your back holding a stability ball between your feet. Lift your legs and the ball toward the ceiling, lower slowly without arching your back, and repeat for reps.

name: Lying leg raises with kettlebell pullover
variations: Lying leg raises with band abduction
Lying leg raises with stability ball
written_instructions:
1. Lie on your back with a kettlebell held in both hands overhead, arms extended, and legs straight on the floor.
2. Engage your core and press your lower back into the floor.
3. Simultaneously lift your legs and pull the kettlebell toward your shins, bringing them together in a controlled motion.
4. Slowly lower your legs and return the kettlebell to the starting overhead position.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie on your back with a kettlebell overhead and legs straight. Lift your legs and pull the kettlebell toward your shins, then slowly return to the starting position. Repeat for reps.

name: Hanging knees-bent leg raise
variations: Lying leg raises with band abduction
Lying leg raises with stability ball
Lying leg raises with kettlebell pullover
written_instructions:
1. Hang from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, arms fully extended, and feet together.
2. Engage your core and keep your spine neutral.
3. Lift your knees toward your chest while keeping them bent.
4. Slowly lower your legs back to the starting position under control.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Hang from a pull-up bar. Lift your knees toward your chest, then lower slowly. Repeat for reps.

name: Hanging straight-leg leg raise
variations: Lying leg raises with band abduction
Lying leg raises with stability ball
Lying leg raises with kettlebell pullover
written_instructions:
1. Hang from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, arms fully extended, and feet together.
2. Engage your core and keep your spine neutral.
3. Lift your legs straight in front of you toward the ceiling.
4. Slowly lower your legs back to the starting position under control without swinging.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Hang from a pull-up bar. Lift your legs straight in front of you, lower slowly without swinging, and repeat for reps.

name: Crunches
written_instructions:
1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor, arms crossed over your chest or hands behind your head.
2. Engage your core.
3. Curl your shoulders and upper back off the floor, keeping your lower back pressed.
4. Pause briefly at the top.
5. Slowly lower back to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie on your back with knees bent. Curl your shoulders off the floor, pause briefly, then lower back down. Repeat for reps.

name: Crunches sliding hands over tights
written_instructions:
1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor, hands resting near your thighs.
2. Engage your core.
3. Slide your hands up toward your knees as you curl your shoulders and upper back off the floor.
4. Pause briefly at the top of the movement.
5. Slowly lower back to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie on your back with knees bent. Slide your hands toward your knees as you curl your shoulders off the floor, then lower slowly. Repeat for reps.

name: Weighted Crunches
written_instructions:
1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Hold a weight plate or dumbbell against your chest or extended above your chest.
2. Engage your core.
3. Curl your shoulders and upper back off the floor, keeping your lower back pressed.
4. Pause briefly at the top, squeezing your abdominals.
5. Slowly lower back to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of reps.
audio_script: Lie on your back holding a weight against or above your chest. Curl shoulders off the floor, squeeze abs at the top, then lower slowly. Repeat for reps.

name: Mountain climbers
written_instructions:
1. Start in a high plank position with hands under shoulders and feet together.
2. Engage your core and keep your spine neutral.
3. Drive one knee toward your chest, then quickly switch legs in a running-like motion.
4. Continue alternating legs at a controlled but consistent pace.
5. Repeat for the desired number duration.
audio_script: Start in a plank position. Drive one knee toward your chest, then switch legs quickly, alternating for duration.

name: Dumbbell suitcase carry
written_instructions:
1. Stand upright holding a dumbbell in one hand at your side.
2. Engage your core and keep your shoulders squared, spine neutral.
3. Walk forward for a designated distance or time, resisting lateral tilt from the weight.
4. Maintain an upright posture throughout.
5. Switch sides and repeat for the same distance or duration.
audio_script: Hold a dumbbell in one hand at your side. Engage your core, walk forward resisting tilt, then switch sides. Repeat for distance or time.

name: Static pallof press with cable
written_instructions:
1. Stand perpendicular to a cable machine with the handle held at chest level, arms bent, and feet shoulder-width apart.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Press the handle straight out in front of you, resisting rotation.
4. Hold this position for the desired duration.
5. Slowly return to chest level and repeat for reps or hold on the other side.
audio_script: Stand perpendicular to a cable, hold handle at chest, press straight out while resisting rotation. Hold or return slowly, then repeat on the other side.

name: Dynamic pallof press with cable
written_instructions:
1. Stand perpendicular to a cable machine with the handle held at chest level, arms bent, and feet shoulder-width apart.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Press the handle straight out in front of you and slowly bring it back toward your chest.
4. Perform this pressing motion dynamically while resisting rotation.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps, then switch sides.
audio_script: Stand perpendicular to a cable, hold the handle at chest. Press it straight out and back dynamically while resisting rotation. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: Static pallof press with band
written_instructions:
1. Attach a handle to a loop band anchored at chest height. Stand perpendicular to the anchor, holding the handle at chest level with arms bent and feet shoulder-width apart.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Press the handle straight out in front of you, resisting rotation.
4. Hold this position for the desired duration.
5. Slowly return to chest level and repeat on the other side.
audio_script: Stand perpendicular to a loop band anchored at chest height, holding the handle at chest. Press straight out, resist rotation, hold, then return. Repeat on the other side.

name: Dynamic pallof press with band
written_instructions:
1. Attach a handle to a loop band anchored at chest height. Stand perpendicular to the anchor, holding the handle at chest level with arms bent and feet shoulder-width apart.
2. Engage your core and keep your torso upright.
3. Press the handle straight out in front of you and then back toward your chest dynamically, resisting rotation.
4. Maintain control throughout the movement.
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps, then switch sides.
audio_script: Stand perpendicular to a loop band anchored at chest height, holding the handle at chest. Press out and back dynamically while resisting rotation. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: High-to-low cable wood chop
written_instructions:
1. Attach a handle to a high pulley on a cable machine. Stand next to the pulley with feet shoulder-width apart, holding the handle with both hands.
2. Engage your core and keep a slight bend in your knees.
3. Pull the handle diagonally down across your body toward the opposite hip in a controlled chopping motion.
4. Slowly return to the starting position.
5. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.
audio_script: Hold a cable handle from a high pulley. Pull diagonally down across your body toward opposite hip, then return slowly. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

name: low-to-high cable wood chop
written_instructions:
1. Attach a handle to a low pulley on a cable machine. Stand next to the pulley with feet shoulder-width apart, holding the handle with both hands.
2. Engage your core and maintain a slight bend in your knees.
3. Pull the handle diagonally upward across your body toward the opposite shoulder in a controlled chopping motion.
4. Slowly return to the starting position.
5. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.
audio_script: Hold a cable handle from a low pulley. Pull diagonally up across your body toward opposite shoulder, then return slowly. Repeat for reps, then switch sides.
